name: width/height attributes only: resize to smaller than it is
width/height attributes only: resize to larger than it is
notes to validate: should be 900x900 and expanded with empty space in the bottom right

name: viewBox attribute only: resized to 100 width
viewBox attribute only: resized to 100 height
percent width/height attributes and viewBox attribute: resized to 100x400
notes to validate: should be 100x400 and vertically centered, a full circle (not a quarter one)

name: percent width/height attributes and viewBox attribute: resized to 100 width
notes to validate: should be 100x100, nicely scaled, a full circle (not a quarter one)

name: percent width/height attributes and viewBox attribute: resized to 200 height
notes to validate: should be 200x200, nicely scaled, a full circle (not a quarter one)

name: width/height and viewBox attributes: no resizing
notes to validate: should be 505x505 and not have any green borders

name: width/height and viewBox attributes: resized to a height of 100
notes to validate: should be 100x100 and not have any green borders

name: width/height and viewBox attributes: resized to 100x600
notes to validate: should be 100x600, vertically centered, and with a transparent background

name: no width/height and no viewBox: resized to smaller than it is
notes to validate: should be cropped to upper left

name: no width/height and no viewBox: resized to larger than it is
notes to validate: should be expanded with empty space in the bottom right
